General.Name: Source Energy Services Ltd
General.Description: Source Energy Services Ltd. produces, supplies, and distributes Northern White frac sand used primarily in oil and gas exploration and production in Western Canada and the United States. It also provides storage and logistics services for other bulk oil and gas well completion materials; and develops wellsite mobile sand storage and handling system. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 1060 - 7th Street SW, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2R 0C4
